Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Huazacin (Thuricin Z, 4S=CA, natural AMPs; XXJ; UCSB1c, sactipeptide; bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes, BBMm)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (38.1%) toSubtilosin A1. There are four S=Calpha bonds: C16-D26, C12-T30, C8-Y34, and C4-H38.Activity: Huazacin inhibited the growth of L. monocytogenes 4b F2365 (MIC 4 uM). Anotherpaper) found active against B. cereus (MIC 2-8 uM) by targeting membranes.
Literature Information.Author: Hudson GA, Burkhart BJ, DiCaprio AJ, Schwalen CJ, Kille B, Pogorelov TV, Mitchell DA. 2019
Literature Information.Title: Thuricin Z: A Narrow-Spectrum Sactibiotic that Targets the Cell Membrane
